模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.tuition

类 Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.tuition.Date
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
A class constructing the date structure which storing the different attributes of date.
作者:
Xinyu Meng, Chengyu Liang

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Date

      public Date(int year, int month, int day)
      Constructor for creating a Date object.
      参数:
      year - The record of year.
      month - The record of month.
      day - The record of day.

  • 方法详细资料

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      A method checking if the given date is a valid date.
      返回:
      true if the given date is valid false if it is not.

    • checkthirtyonedaysmonth

      public boolean checkthirtyonedaysmonth()
      A method used in isValid() that checks if a month has 31 days.
      返回:
      true if the month has 31 days, false if the month has 30 days.

    • checkfebdays

      public boolean checkfebdays()
      A method used in isValid() that checks if a year is a leap year.
      返回:
      true if it is a leap year, false if it is not a leap year.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      Compare the two dates and show the result.
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Date>
      参数:
      date - A date object to be compared with the other one.
      返回:
      1 or -1 depends on the different dates.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Get the string format of a Date object.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
      返回:
      the string format of a Date object.
